activities:
Avention, Inc f/k/a OneSource Information Services, Inc.  receives the following personal information from the EU:
1. Human Resources information
2. Customer/prospect contact information
3. Executive information contained within the data supplied to Avention by its information providers
Avention uses the first two sources of personal information for its internal administration and sales activities, respectively.  Avention includes executive information in its various business information product offerings.
personaldata: Human resources data, customer/prospect contact information, and executive information
recoursemech: OneSource will comply with EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)
